titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Benno C. Schmidt, Jr., President of Yale University, Records
Schmidt, Jr. (Benno C), President of Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:32

did.unittitle: Benno C. Schmidt, Jr., president of Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of subject files, correspondence, annual reports, and memoranda documenting Benno C. Schmidt's activities as president of Yale University. The records contain substantive documentation on virtually every aspect of the university administration, schools, departments, and other major units.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 2-A (YRG 2-A), Records of the Yale president's office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Benno C. Schmidt, Jr., President of Yale University, Records (RU 281). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Benno C. Schmidt, Jr., served as president of Yale University from 1986-1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of subject files, correspondence, annual reports, and memoranda documenting Benno C. Schmidt's activities as president of Yale University. The records contain substantive documentation on virtually every aspect of the university administration, schools, departments, and other major units.
